duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop comprehensive personal branding strategy aligning with the entrepreneur's vision and goals.
Assist in producing engaging content, blogs, articles, and webinar presentations showcasing expertise in real estate investment.
Manage and grow the entrepreneur's social media presence on LinkedIn and Facebook.
Research and identify speaking opportunities, coordinate speaking engagements, manage calendar, and handle travel arrangements.
Assist in negotiations, provide administrative support, and maintain high organization in all tasks.
Utilize analytical tools to measure the success of branding initiatives and marketing campaigns.

education_certification.credential: College degree in Marketing or related field.
